1370: Rase was born in Helle voet in 1370.
Got married to Rabburgis at age 21 in 1370.
Had a daughter with Rabburgis, Menoldis, at age 21.
1371: Lost daughter Menoldis when Menoldis was 2 years old.
1373: Had a son with Rabburgis, Wederic, at age 24.
1374: Had a son with Rabburgis, Elyasа, at age 25.
1378: Had a daughter with Rabburgis, Marie, at age 29.
Lost son Elyasа when Elyasа was 5 years old.
1379: Had a son with Rabburgis, Wellinus, at age 30.
1380: Lost his wife Rabburgis while she was giving birth to Gheesen in 1380.
1385: Lost son Wellinus when Wellinus was 7 years old.
Has seen several of their children die.
